example.prompt: Summarize the book of Genesis in 5 lines.

messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that explains things simply.
Summarize the book of Genesis in 5 lines.
Genesis describes creation, the fall, the flood, Abraham, and the birth of Israel.

Exodus tells the story of the Israelites' escape from slavery in Egypt under Moses' leadership. God provides miracles, including parting the Red Sea, to lead them to freedom. The Israelites receive the Ten Commandments on Mount Sinai and establish a covenant with God. They wander in the wilderness for 40 years before entering the Promised Land.

example.instruction: Explain max extension is 30 days, 5% interest after

messages.content:
CONVERSATION HISTORY:
[2025-10-04] CUSTOMER: Hello World 

INSTRUCTION: Explain max extension is 30 days, 5% interest after
Hello! We're here to help with your account. Our maximum extension is 30 days, with 5% interest thereafter.
Add Sir after Hello and be more respectful
Hello Sir! We're here to assist you with your account. Our maximum extension is 30 days, with 5% interest thereafter. Would you kindly like to discuss further?
Hello Sir, our max extension is 30 days at 5% interest thereafter.

example.message:
Dear Douglas Hudson,  

Thank you for trusting OpalAlign with your care. We noticed a balance of $636.00 from your visit on 2025-09-07.  

You can make a secure payment here: https://buy.stripe.com/test_7sY5kD3ZcdQUcpu3lgaEE1O or call us at +3059233585 if you have any questions.  

We look forward to seeing you at your next appointment.  

 OpalAlign

templates.template:
Payment Reminder

Dear {PatientName},

This is a friendly reminder about your outstanding balance of {Balance}.

Please contact us to arrange payment at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
{PracticeName}

Contact us: {PracticePhone} | {PracticeEmail}

templates.name: Message for follow-ups
templates.template:
Hi {patientName}, we noticed you missed your appointment.
Please call us to reschedule at your earliest convenience.
Thanks

Thank you

templates.name: Message template for reappointment reminders
templates.template: Hi {patientName}, it's time for your follow-up appointment. Please call us to schedule your next visit.

templates.name: Message template for declined treatment follow-ups
templates.template:
Hello {patientName}, we wanted to follow up on your declined treatment.
 Please let us know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
John

templates.name: Message template for unscheduled treatment reminders
templates.template:
Hello {patientName},  we are reaching out because you have unscheduled treatment here at Advanced Dental Arts Wesley Chapel. 

Please give us a call at 813-973-8555, to get unscheduled treatment scheduled or you can book directly online: https: //rwl.io/40y5OG8.

Thank you and we look forward to taking care of you!

templates.name: Message template for overdue appointment reminders
templates.template: Hello {patientName}, you have an overdue appointment. Please contact us to schedule a new appointment.
